readme:
# language-chip8asm

Adds syntax highlighting and snippets to CHIP8 Assembly files in Atom. It is based on http://devernay.free.fr/hacks/chip8/C8TECH10.HTM#6xkk.

### TODO
- Add compatibility with the Octo Assembly Language (an alternative assembly language to CHIP8 - https://github.com/JohnEarnest/Octo)
